SIGILS.STATEMENT_DESCRIPTION: The statement must be positive, achievable and contain a feeling
SIGILS.STRATEGY_1_DESCRIPTION: Only characters that appear once in the statement are retained.
SIGILS.STRATEGY_2_DESCRIPTION: If a character appears multiple times, only the first occurrence is retained.
SIGILS.STRATEGY_3_DESCRIPTION: Pairs of 2 characters are deleted, only the characters that appear an odd number of times remain.
